result.eng: The computer has run out of memory.
result.ga: tá cuimhne an ríomhaire ídithe
result.orig: tá cuimhne an ríomhaire ídithe
result.html: tá cuimhne an ríomhaire íditheThe computer has run out of memory.
result.ponchtml: tá cuiṁne an ríoṁaire ídiṫeThe computer has run out of memory.

result.eng: If my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.
result.html: más buan mo chuimhneIf my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.
result.ponchtml: más buan mo ċuiṁneIf my memory serves me right. If I remember correctly.

result.eng: I can't you chase you out of my memory.
result.ga: ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhne
result.orig: ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhne
result.html: ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeadh as mo chuimhneI can't you chase you out of my memory.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom tú a ruaigeaḋ as mo ċuiṁneI can't you chase you out of my memory.

result.ga: tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoine
result.orig: tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoine
result.html: tá sé le cuimhne na ndaoineIt is within living memory.
result.ponchtml: tá sé le cuiṁne na ndaoineIt is within living memory.
